import React, { useState } from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' const App = () => { // save clicks of each button to own state const [good, setGood] = useState(0) const [neutral, setNeutral] = useState(0) const [bad, setBad] = useState(0) let total = good + neutral + bad; return (
